评论详情: It’s a beautiful article of clothing -it’s very thick and it fits right @ the top of my waistline. Does not have a lot of stretch but that’s okay I like the structures feel of this piece.  It makes it look rich.  Loving the color and yet the polka dots make it a bit playful.  I gave it 4 stars as it does run just a bit small. I’m 5’5, 163 pounds and I bought so Large.
The color is pretty, it's thick and well made, super cute but still professional.
